dialogueSegments.text: Here you go Alan! A coffee, brewed to perfection. What do you think?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: I knew it smelled just like it… but it even tastes like it!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan

dialogueSegments.text: My mom’s coffee, back home. When I walked in earlier, what you were making smelled just like what my mom would make for my dad and I every morning before school. We’d spend that little bit of early morning together, right as the sun peeks over the horizon. It was nice.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan

dialogueSegments.text: Oh, just a few ingredients from out in the wilderness! I just used up the last of my supply on that last attempt, but don’t worry, I know exactly what I need and how much I need. Sit tight, I’ll be back in a jif!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: You know what? I think I’ll take you up on the offer sometime. Thanks Chef. I’ll catch you around.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan
